title: A Barbaric Proposal - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Curses   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Enemies Become Lovers   European Ambience   Fallen Nobility   Family Conflict   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Hiding True Identity   Kind Love Interests   Kingdoms   Knights   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Mercenaries   Misunderstandings   Mysterious Family Background   Mysterious Past   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Past Plays a Big Role   Politics   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Priests   Royalty   Secret Identity   Selfless Protagonist   Slow Growth at Start   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   Timid Protagonist   Tragic Past   Twins   Unconditional Love   Villainess Noble Girls   Wars
author: Yoonah Lee   이윤아
description:
“I already have a child with another man.”

It was a lie made in order to refuse the proposal of the leader of the most feared mercenary company in the entire country. But his response was unexpected.

“It doesn’t matter who the child is. You can just give birth. In exchange, I’ll take you, Princess.”

She couldn’t understand.

What could this man possibly want with the princess of a failing nation?>
